title: [Balcony of Chaotic Knowledge]
description: Rising several handspans from the smooth floor, an onyx-tiled and travertine railing encircles the balcony that is exposed to the open air.  Stretching upon the horizon is a sprawling city, while nearer at hand and far below is the black glass dome of the Garden of Chaos.  An illuminated teleportation disk recessed into the ground flashes with a steady pulse and fills the air with a gentle humming sound.
